com.webcheckers.application

Class GameCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webcheckers.application.GameCenter

  • public class GameCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    GameCenter

    Stores a collection of Games across all current sessions and provides various methods for interacting with the current Games.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GameCenter()
      The default constructor for the GameCenter class.

      GameContext createGame(Player player1, Player player2)
      Creates a new game to store in the list of ongoing games using the specified Player objects as the players in the game.

      boolean resign(GameContext game, Player player)
      Resigns the specified player from the specified game.
      boolean resignAll(Player player)
      Resigns the specified player from any games they may be playing in.

      • createGame

        public GameContext createGame(Player player1,
                              Player player2)
        Creates a new game to store in the list of ongoing games using the specified Player objects as the players in the game.
        Parameters:
        player1 - the player that will play as Red
        player2 - the player that will play as white
        Returns:
        the newly created GameState

      • resignAll

        public boolean resignAll(Player player)
        Resigns the specified player from any games they may be playing in.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to resign
        Returns:
        the number of games the player resigned from

      • resign

        public boolean resign(GameContext game,
                      Player player)
        Resigns the specified player from the specified game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game from which the player resigned
        player - the player to resign
        Returns:
        if the player was successfully resigned
